pages.title: Quick Lookup
pages.text: To improve the guide, we added a $(key)Quick Lookup$() feature to $(key)$(italic)Magic Guide$()!$(br2)There are two ways to use it:$(br)$(list)In the $(bold)inventory screen$(), $(bold)hover$() an item and $(bold)hold Ctrl$()$(br)$(list)In the $(bold)world$(), $(bold)aim at$() a block, hold $(key)$(italic)Magic Guide$() and $(bold)sneak-right-click$()$(br2)
$(t:How's that? Sounds a bit like Lexica Botania — a salute to the predecessor of magic :>)—Then you'll jump to the entry for that item/block in this book (if any)!$()
